name: Gulf Air Academy
about: Gulf Air Academy, located in Athens, Greece, is an EASA-approved professional pilot training organization committed to excellence in aviation education. With a diverse team from over seven countries, the academy offers a multinational and engaging educational environment. Utilizing state-of-the-art training materials and methods, Gulf Air Academy provides top-tier training programs, including EASA ATPL courses with 230 flying hours. The academy ensures a supportive and friendly environment, with fully furnished accommodation and a range of social activities. Despite some logistical challenges reported, the academy is known for its professional instructors and comprehensive support for international students, making it a significant player in addressing the global pilot shortage. Gulf Air Academy is dedicated to providing high-quality training and a seamless educational experience for aspiring pilots.
services:

Commercial Pilot License

Jet Orientation Course (JOT)

Multi-Engine Rating

EASA ATPL Ground School
EASA ATPL Ab Initio"]
